name: HomeLess with Me
description:
In Homeless with Me, you play as a single father who has just lost custody of his son. You must escape the poverty cycle and get your life back in shape in two weeks, or it will be too late. 

The game uses AWSD to walk, the mouse to look around and navigate menus, and E to interact when available. To quit you have to hit F4 (sorry but it is a Beta). 

Created by David Page, Nathanael Stevenson and myself
